info.title: Qredit Node & QAE API
info.description:
This is a API documentation for **the Qredit Blockhain** built with Swagger UI to make testing a breeze. 

The **Community SSL Public API** used as test host is provided from **[qredit.io](https://www.qredit.io/)**.

tags.name: QAE
tags.description: Operations for Smart Contracts (Please select server qae.qredit.cloud/api)

get.summary: Get all addresses for a tokenId
Get token balance by address and tokenid
List Transactions for a TokenID & Address
Get the balance of an account
Get the public key of an account
Get the delegate fee of an account
Get the delegates of an account

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: A string that specifies the column by which to sort the records.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: An unsigned integer that specifies the maximum number of records.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: An unsigned integer that specified the number of records to skip.
